opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: United States Ex Rel. Graves v. Itt Educational Services, Inc. And United States Ex Rel. Bowman v. Education America, Inc.

opinion:
544 U.S. 978

UNITED STATES EX REL. GRAVES ET AL.
v.
ITT EDUCATIONAL SERVICES, INC., ET AL.; and UNITED STATES EX REL. BOWMAN
v.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 111 Fed. Appx. 296 (first judgment); 116 Fed. Appx. 531 (second judgment).
